archetypes.name: Caregiver
archetypes.reflection: What can you do to take better care of yourself?

archetypes.name: Creator
archetypes.reflection: What can you do to unleash your creativity?

archetypes.name: Dreamer
archetypes.reflection: What can you do to turn your dreams into reality?

archetypes.name: Inner Child
archetypes.reflection: What can you do to reconnect with your inner child?

archetypes.name: Ruler
archetypes.reflection: What can you do to become a better leader?

archetypes.name: Seeker
archetypes.reflection: What can you do to explore the world around you?

archetypes.name: Trickster
archetypes.reflection: What can you do to use humor positively?
